articles.description: Manchester City will be looking at the likes of Erling Haaland and Lionel Messi to add “X-factor” to their squad, says Claus Lundekvam, with a former Norway international of the opinion that a fellow countryman is what the Blues need in upcoming windows.

articles.title: 2021 Fixture: Saints to battle Giants in Round 1 - St Kilda FC
articles.description: There’s a big, big clash locked in for St Kilda’s opening match of the 2021 Season against GWS.
articles.content:
Theres a big, big clash locked in for St Kildas opening match of the 2021 Season, with Brett Rattens side set to lock horns with GWS on Sunday 21 March at GIANTS Stadium.
